contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|cocoon}} '''Cocoon''' may refer to: *[[Cocoon (silk)]], a pupal casing made by moth caterpillars and other insect larvae *[[Apache Cocoon]], web development software *[[Cocoon (film)|''Cocoon'' (film)]], a 1985 science fiction film **''[[Cocoon: The Return]]'', 1988 sequel to ''Cocoon'' *[[Kakuna]], a species of Pokémon, known as ''Cocoon'' in the original Japanese version *"Cocoon", a short story by Greg Egan in his collection ''[[Luminous (story collection)|Luminous]]'' *Cocoon, a fictional world in the video game ''[[Final Fantasy XIII]]'' *"Cocoon", an episode of ''[[Hawaii Five-O]]'' ==Music== *[[Cocoon (Alexis Strum album)|''Cocoon'' (Alexis Strum album)]], 2006, or the title song *[[Cocoon (Meg & Dia album)|''Cocoon'' (Meg & Dia album)]], 2011 *[[Cocoon (Björk song)|"Cocoon" (Björk song)]] *[[Cocoon (band)]], A French band *[[Cocoon (Anna Tsuchiya song)|"Cocoon" (Anna Tsuchiya song)]] *''Cocoon'', an album by [[Yorico]] *"Cocoon", a song by The Decemberists from ''[[Castaways and Cutouts]]'' *"Cocoon", a song by Guster from ''[[Parachute (Guster album)|Parachute]]'' *"Cocoon", a song by Jack Johnson from ''[[On and On (Jack Johnson album)|On and On]]'' *"Cocoon", an instrumental by Timerider, the original theme music for the UK TV programme ''[[The Hit Man and Her]]'' *[[Cocoon Recordings]], a German record label {{disambiguation}}
